text: Dovhe Pole (Ukrainian: Довге Поле; Hungarian: Unghosszúmező) is a village in the Uzhhorodskyi Raion in the Zakarpattia Oblast in western Ukraine. Dovhe Pole is located 7 km southeast of Uzhhorod. == History == The village was settled at the beginning of the 14th century. Its first written mention dates back to 1351 under the name Hosszúmező. Its first inhabitants were Hungarians. ==References== Category:Settlements of Uzhhorod District Category:Villages in Ukraine
title: Dovhe Pole
